item.title: No. 1 Arizona Wildcats Dominating with Size and Physicality Under Tommy Lloyd
item.description: Head coach Tommy Lloyd has transformed the Arizona Wildcats into a rebounding powerhouse with a bulked-up roster strategy.

item.title: 2026 World Baseball Classic Caps Unveiled for All 20 Countries
item.description: The hats for all 20 countries in the 2026 World Baseball Classic were unveiled on Thursday. Take a look!

item.title: 2026 MLB Free Agent Signings, Trades: Rockies Sign 2024 All-Star on 2-Year Deal
item.description: Keeping tabs on all of MLB's notable free agency signings, trades, and extensions ahead of the 2026 season.

item.title: 2026 UFL Draft: Every Player Selected by Position for All 8 Teams
item.description: The 2026 UFL Draft is taking place at UFL HQ in Arlington, Texas on Jan. 13 and 14. Here are the draft results, by team.

item.title: 'I'll Be Nervous': Kershaw on Potentially Facing Ohtani at World Baseball Classic
item.description: Clayton Kershaw will pitch for Team USA for at the World Baseball Classic. Just don't ask him to pitch against Shohei Ohtani.
